channel.title: CVE Feed for Hewlett Packard Enterprise -- HPE OfficeConnect 1820 Network switches
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hewlett Packard Enterprise -- HPE OfficeConnect 1820 Network switches

item.title: CVE-2024-22438|2024-04-15T09:37:46.770Z -- Hewlett Packard Enterprise -- HPE OfficeConnect 1820 Network switches
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in Hewlett Packard Enterprise OfficeConnect 1820 Network switches. The vulnerability could be remotely exploited to allow execution of malicious code.
